ModSettings.name: High Elven Longbowmen Fix
ModSettings.title: [Unit] High Elven Longbowmen Fix
ModSettings.description:
High Elven Longbowmen "Long Range" Fix.
When I played the original back in 1994, the Elven Longbowmen unit had the Long Range skill. The skill never appeared in the UI, but was documented as almost a hidden feature of the unit.
Missile units also received 2 shots a turn (which is another story).
This is a fix to restore the "Long Range" skill to the venerated Elven Longbowmen, the best High Elven unit and arguably, the best ranged unit in the game.
This Mod gives players a chance to see for themselves the impact of the Elven Archer with the "Long Range" skill restored makes.
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
